metadata.description: Exact baseline matching Hüttenrauch et al. (2019) Rendezvous configuration. Used to validate implementation and establish baseline convergence behavior.
metadata.source: Deep Reinforcement Learning for Swarm Systems (arXiv:1807.06613)
metadata.notes: These are the exact parameters Hüttenrauch used. They achieved convergence in 100-200 TRPO iterations (~500 iterations total training).

huttenrauch_baseline_20agents_embed64.description: Hüttenrauch baseline: 20 agents, embed_dim=64, seed=0. This is the validation run to confirm convergence.
